org.openjdk.tools.javac.tree

接口 EndPosTable

  • 所有已知实现类:
    JavacParser.AbstractEndPosTable, JavacParser.EmptyEndPosTable, JavacParser.SimpleEndPosTable

    public interface EndPosTable
    Specifies the methods to access a mappings of syntax trees to end positions.

    This is NOT part of any supported API. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int getEndPos(JCTree tree)
      This method will return the end position of a given tree, otherwise a Positions.NOPOS will be returned.
      int replaceTree(JCTree oldtree, JCTree newtree)
      Give an old tree and a new tree, the old tree will be replaced with the new tree, the position of the new tree will be that of the old tree.
      void storeEnd(JCTree tree, int endpos)
      Store ending position for a tree, the value of which is the greater of last error position and the given ending position.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getEndPos

        int getEndPos(JCTree tree)
        This method will return the end position of a given tree, otherwise a Positions.NOPOS will be returned.
        参数:
        tree - JCTree
        返回:
        position of the source tree or Positions.NOPOS for non-existent mapping

      • storeEnd

        void storeEnd(JCTree tree,
              int endpos)
        Store ending position for a tree, the value of which is the greater of last error position and the given ending position.
        参数:
        tree - The tree.
        endpos - The ending position to associate with the tree.

      • replaceTree

        int replaceTree(JCTree oldtree,
                JCTree newtree)
        Give an old tree and a new tree, the old tree will be replaced with the new tree, the position of the new tree will be that of the old tree.
        参数:
        oldtree - a JCTree to be replaced
        newtree - a JCTree to be replaced with
        返回:
        position of the old tree or Positions.NOPOS for non-existent mapping
